workflow: perplexity.ai manual analysis - player props deep dive

daily_results.notes: Mitchell OUT (rest). Garland dominated 4Q with 14 pts. Primary scorer thesis validated. Pacers weak perimeter D (119.7 OPP PPG).

CRITICAL FAILURE: Only 1 rebound vs 11 assists. 1.5 points short despite hitting pts/ast. Model underestimated rebounding variance on PRA props. Haliburton OUT (season-ending) expanded role but unbalanced contributions.
Landed exactly on line. Usage thesis validated (16 FGA vs 15-18 projected). #2 scoring option without Mitchell. Tough break.
Volume achieved (23 FGA) but poor shooting (39.1%). Home splits edge (25.4 PPG) didn't materialize. Shooting variance killed the over. 2.5 pts short.
EXECUTION MISS: Got 27 min (projection hit) but completely passive with only 2 FGA. Role player variance risk materialized. Road over trend (10/11) broken.

daily_results.box_score: 9 PTS + 11 REB + 2 AST = 22 PRA in 31 minutes (CAREER-BEST)
daily_results.notes: SURPRISE PERFORMER: Projected 10.8, got 22. Game-script dependent - competitive score allowed extended bench usage (31 min vs 7.6 avg). Dominated glass with 11 rebounds.

key_storylines: Pacers (6-28) extended losing streak to 13 games (franchise record)
Mitchell rested; Garland + Mobley elevated roles
Haliburton season-ending Achilles tear; Nembhard primary handler

model_performance.analysis: Small sample (6 bets) + execution failures (Nembhard rebounding, Tyson passivity) + shooting variance (Siakam) drove negative outcome. Garland/Mobley/Furphy validated usage/game-script theses. PRA props require balanced stat tracking.

lessons_learned: ‚ùå PRA variance critical - 1 rebound killed Nembhard (21.5% edge)
‚ùå Role player passivity risk - Tyson 3 pts despite 27 min
‚úÖ Game-script matters for bench - Furphy 31 min in competitive game
üìä Need balanced-stat weighting for PRA props
üéØ Tier A bets split 1-1; Tier B bets 0-2 (selection issue?)
calibration_recommendations: Increase edge threshold for PRA props from 5.0% to 6.5%
Add rebounding variance penalty to PRA simulations
Reduce kelly fraction for role players < 15% season usage
Increase sample size requirement for game-script bets (Furphy)
Monitor Tier B bet performance - adjust confidence calibration
